title: Hybrid Expense Tracker Web App
description:
Hybrid Expense Tracker Web App is a feature-rich, privacy-focused financial management platform that empowers users to take full control of their personal and household finances. It supports real-time synchronization across devices and ensures data privacy through end-to-end encryption.

The app allows seamless tracking of expenses, savings across multiple accounts, loans, and customizable budgets. Users can visualize financial health through interactive dashboards and analytical charts.

Data is encrypted at rest and in transit, with import/export options available in both encrypted and plain formats. Additional features include base currency configuration and downloadable financial reports, making it ideal for global users seeking clarity, security, and control in one application.

title: Live Chatting Web-App
description:
A real-time chat application that enables seamless communication between users in multiple chat rooms. Users can view available rooms, see active members, receive join/leave notifications, and engage in instant messaging.

Admins can manage users within rooms, including the ability to remove participants. The app ensures a smooth chatting experience with live socket communication and dynamic room updates.

title: Cloud-Based Image Recognition System
description:
A cloud-powered image recognition system that automatically detects and labels objects within images using machine learning APIs. By leveraging Google Cloud Vision, the system provides fast and accurate identification of various elements from uploaded photos.

Ideal for educational, research, or real-world application needs that involve object detection, classification, and labeling.

title: TaskFlow: Smart Task Management & Visualization
description:
TaskFlow is a visually-driven task management web application designed to help individuals and teams organize, track, and visualize tasks efficiently. It integrates Firebase Firestore for real-time task updates and uses React D3 Tree for graph-based visual task hierarchy representation.

Users can seamlessly manage task dependencies, priorities, and progress in an intuitive interface that blends checklist simplicity with visual clarity.

title: Project Management System
description:
A centralized system for managing student project records, enabling faculty to efficiently supervise, organize, and maintain detailed project documentation including source code submissions and evaluation tracking.

The system provides streamlined workflows for project assignment, review, and categorization, built with a focus on academic supervision and collaboration.

title: Vaidyatrix Android App
description:
Vaidyatrix is a SaaS-based Android application tailored for BAMS doctors to manage patient records digitally, improve diagnosis accuracy, and reduce paperwork. The app securely stores all medical records and reports on AWS Cloud (S3), ensuring availability and data integrity.

Designed with healthcare workflow in mind, it simplifies clinical record-keeping and enhances the patient care experience.
